query:
SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  COUNT(DISTINCT id) as unicos,
  NULL as total_gerado
FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Produtos',
  COUNT(*),
  NULL
FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Concorrentes',
  COUNT(DISTINCT concorrenteHash),
  49 as total_gerado
FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Leads',
  COUNT(DISTINCT leadHash),
  25 as total_gerado
FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1;
